comment:
* Contains power consumption data attributed to a specific UID.
 *
 * @hide

variables.name: STATE_FOREGROUND
variables.comment: * The state of an application when it is either running a foreground (top) activity.

variables.name: STATE_BACKGROUND
variables.comment:
* The state of an application when it is running in the background, including the following
     * states:
     *
     * {@link android.app.ActivityManager#PROCESS_STATE_IMPORTANT_BACKGROUND},
     * {@link android.app.ActivityManager#PROCESS_STATE_TRANSIENT_BACKGROUND},
     * {@link android.app.ActivityManager#PROCESS_STATE_BACKUP},
     * {@link android.app.ActivityManager#PROCESS_STATE_SERVICE},
     * {@link android.app.ActivityManager#PROCESS_STATE_RECEIVER},
     * {@link android.app.ActivityManager#PROCESS_STATE_FOREGROUND_SERVICE}.

methods.name: public long getTimeInStateMs(@State int state)
methods.comment:
* Returns the amount of time in milliseconds this UID spent in the specified state.
     * @deprecated use {@link #getTimeInProcessStateMs} instead.

methods.name: public long getTimeInProcessStateMs(@ProcessState int state)
methods.comment: * Returns the amount of time in milliseconds this UID spent in the specified process state.

methods.name: public void dump(PrintWriter pw, boolean skipEmptyComponents)
private void appendProcessStateData(StringBuilder sb, @ProcessState int processState, boolean skipEmptyComponents)
static void createFromXml(TypedXmlPullParser parser, BatteryUsageStats.Builder builder) throws XmlPullParserException, IOException
methods.comment: Parses an XML representation and populates the BatteryUsageStats builder
